title: Manikyam Polki Jhumka: Ruby and Diamond Blossom Earrings
features: Classic Jhumka design with a floral motif. The top features a vibrant Ruby cabochon, surrounded by delicate Polki diamonds. The lower portion is crafted in a semi-circular arrangement of Polki diamonds, creating a 'blossom' effect. The intricate setting showcases the craftsmanship of Hyderabadi artisans, with careful attention to detail to bring out the natural beauty of each gemstone.
colors: and the unique shimmer of Polki diamonds (ranging from near colorless to milky white).
occasions: and other festive occasions. Also suitable for formal events where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: Timeless South Indian design blending tradition with regal elegance. The use of natural Ruby and uncut Polki diamonds enhances its value and unique charm. The Hyderabadi polish gives it an authentic antique feel, making it a cherished heirloom. A symbol of prosperity and grace, perfect for adding a touch of cultural heritage to any ensemble.
